nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 19 is the nineteenth issue of the canon comic book anthology series Star Wars Adventures. The issue is comprised of the stories "Roger Roger," by Cavan Scott, and "Tales from Wild Space: The Big March," by Nick Brokenshire. Star Wars Adventures 19 was published on March 27, 2019 by IDW Publishing.
Legendary General Obi-Wan Kenobi undertakes a daring mission for the Republic Army during the Clone Wars! Guest-starring Captain Rex!
